data.prayer: Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the state of Borsod-Abaúj-Zemplén, Hungary that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Borsod-Abaúj-Zemplén, Hungary
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 21,968 believers in Borsod-Abaúj-Zemplén against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.
God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Borsod-Abaúj-Zemplén, Hungary.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Spirit, train the church of Borsod-Abaúj-Zemplén, Hungary to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Turk people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Turk people.
Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Borsod-Abaúj-Zemplén, Hungary.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

data.prayer: Father, let knowledge and depth of insight abound more and more in the church of Borsod-Abaúj-Zemplén, Hungary.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight,

data.section_summary:
the state of Borsod-Abaúj-Zemplén, Hungary has a population of 719,000.

We estimate Borsod-Abaúj-Zemplén has 21,968 people who might know Jesus, 603,807 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 93,225 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 32 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Borsod-Abaúj-Zemplén who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.
